Short-range scope. 
Quick to aim, with good range.

Low-zoom scope. 
Improved range and handling.

Agile, snappy scope.
Handles beautifully. Rewards a skilled hand.

Very long distance scope.
Superb target acquisition and recoil control.

Mid-zoom precision scope. 
Increased range and target acquisition. 
Heavy.
Improved optics, decreased handling, improved range, slightly decreased stability.

Mid-zoom scope. 
Useful for unpredictable situations.

Longest-range scope. 
Heavy optics for pinpoint sniping.
Improved optics, significantly improved handling.
Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.
Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.
It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.
Crouching grants improved accuracy and stability, as well as reduced aim time and flinch-under-fire.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.
Volatile payload explodes on impact, dealing a portion of the weapon's damage in an area.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.

Ceramic-jacketed rounds ricochet on hard surfaces.
Their extreme density lets you carry more rounds in reserve.
Added mass slows down weapon handling.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.

Increased Range and Stability 
Slower Reload, Reduced Magazine Size
This weapon has extremely low recoil.
Improved range and accuracy.
